channel.title: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM
channel.description:
`/var/cache/tb-binary/.cache/tb/` folder is empty.
Something with this cleanup code code be wrong.
https://github.com/Whonix/tb-updater/blob/master/usr/bin/update-torbrowser#L1798-L1818

item.title: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Fix landed in Whonix 14 testers repository.

However

  • for users who are affected by this bug: will only take effect when https://github.com/Whonix/tb-updater/blob/master/usr/share/tb-updater/tbb_hardcoded_version gets updated the next time, i.e. after a new TBB version gets released. So meanwhile please use update-torbrowser in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM
  • for users who reinstall and get the upgrade before this bug happens, these will not be affacted (although this is no reason at all for reinstallation)

Read full topic
item.source: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM

item.title: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Bug identified most likely.

github.com/Whonix/tb-updater

fix 

https://forums.whonix.org/t/bug-tor-browser-missing-in-dispvm-tor-browser-missing-in-whonix-ws-14-templatevm
by adrelanos on 09:17PM - 27 Aug 18 UTC
changed 1 files with 0 additions and 4 deletions.

Read full topic
item.source: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM

item.title: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Workaround.
Run in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM.
(Do NOT run in whonix-ws-14-dvm DVM Template.)

update-torbrowser

This workaround however is not an explanation / solution for the empty /var/cache/tb-binary/.cache/tb/ folder, so some unidentified bug is at work here.

Read full topic
item.source: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM

item.title: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
/var/cache/tb-binary/.cache/tb/ folder is empty.

Something with this cleanup code code be wrong.

github.com

Whonix/tb-updater/blob/master/usr/bin/update-torbrowser#L1798-L1818

    

  1. if [ -z "$TB_KEEP_OLD_VERSIONS_COUNT" ]; then
    2. 

  2.    TB_KEEP_OLD_VERSIONS_COUNT=3
    3. 

  3. fi
    4. 

  4. if [ "$TB_KEEP_OLD_VERSIONS_COUNT" = "all" ]; then
    5. 

  5.    true "INFO: Keeping all old versions because TB_KEEP_OLD_VERSIONS_COUNT set to 'all', ok."
    6. 

  6.    return 0
    7. 

  7. fi
    8. 

  8. 

    9. 

  9. keep_count="$TB_KEEP_OLD_VERSIONS_COUNT"
    10. 

  10. 

    11. 

  11. for old_folder in $(ls -dr "$tb_browser_folder.old."*); do
    12. 

  12.    if ! [ -d "$old_folder" ]; then
    13. 

  13.       continue
    14. 

  14.    fi
    15. 

  15.    if [ "$keep_count" -eq 0 ]; then
    16. 

  16.       output_echo_only "INFO: Removing '$old_folder'"
    17. 

  17.       rm -rf "$old_folder"
    18. 

  18.    else
    19. 

  19.       ((keep_count--))
    20. 

  20.    fi
    21. 

  21. done
    22.

Read full topic
item.source: bug: Tor Browser missing in DispVM / Tor Browser missing in whonix-ws-14 TemplateVM
